ComicInfo.Title: Battle of the Sexes
ComicInfo.Summary: Battle of the Sexes: The Thing wrestles Battleaxe, as well as the rest of The New Grapplers. The original Titania is killed by Scourge.
ComicInfo.Notes: Scraped metadata from ComicVine [CVDB26611] on 2011.11.07 09:33:59. Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:02:19. [Issue ID 41225]
ComicInfo.Characters: Scourge,Battleaxe,The Thing,Screaming Mimi,Butterball,Demolition Dunphy [D-Man,Ed Garner,Demolition Man],Titania [Davida DeVito] (death),Cowgirl,The New Grapplers [Auntie Freeze,Gladiatrix],Letha,Poundcakes,Magilla,Sharon Ventura,Vavavoom,Sushi
ComicInfo.Teams: Unlimited Class Wrestling Federation,Scourge of the Underworld,Grapplers
